item.title: BC-11 South at TC-1 East
item.description: BC-11 South at TC-1 East to Hope. Continue south on BC-11 for Sumas, USA via the Huntingdon/Sumas Border Crossing.

item.title: Fraser Way East at BC-11
item.description: Fraser Way East at BC-11 in Abbotsford. Use BC-11 north for Mission; BC-11 south for TC-1 junction.

item.title: TC-1 East Exit 92 Offramp at BC-11
item.description: TC-1 East Exit 92 offramp at BC-11 in Abbotsford.

item.title: TC-1 East Exit 92 Offramp at BC-11
item.description: TC-1 east Exit 92 offramp at BC-11. Turn left for BC-11 South/Sumas/USA Border. Turn right for BC-11 North/Abbotsford/Mission.

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 92
item.description: TC-1 east at Exit 92 - BC-11/Mission/USA Border.

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 92
item.description: TC-1 east approaching Exit 92 - BC-11/Mission/USA Border (Huntington/Sumas Crossing).

item.title: BC-99 South - Border Crossing Times
item.description: Vancouver area border crossing times into the USA on BC-99 south. Border crossing times via Peace Arch (BC-99), Pacific X-ING (BC-15), Aldergrove (BC-13), and Sumas (BC-11).

item.title: TC-1 East Exit 92
item.description: TC-1 east approaching Exit 92, BC-11/Mission/Abbotsford/Sumas, USA, 600 metres.
